title: 10 Minutes to Sunset
description: When pediatric dentist Kendra Hatcher is found dead in Dallas, Texas, police uncover a complex plot that leads them on an international manhunt. Keith Morrison reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
